description: For [FunnyDream](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0007), the threat actors likely established an identified email account to register a variety of domains that were used during the campaign.(Citation: Bitdefender FunnyDream Campaign November 2020)

external_references.description: Vrabie, V. (2020, November). Dissecting a Chinese APT Targeting South Eastern Asian Government Institutions. Retrieved September 19, 2022.
